item.description:
Hello everyone,

This art place in Framingham has several performances for kids. See their schedule for March and
April. If you can't attend this show, you might want to go to other performances. Puppet show is a great place to go to while the weather is still cold.


Diane Kordas puppeteer presents: "Bremen Town Musicians"
Saturday, March 06, 2010 at 2:00 PM
Presented at:
Amazing Things Arts Center

160 Hollis St, Framingham MA 01702


Ticket Prices: $8


More info here:


http://amazingthings....

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Puppet Show: Bremen Town Musician - Amazing Things Arts Center Framingham
